summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3051, for the improvement of Fourth Avenue North, Dexter Avenue and Nickerson Street, being a continuous street, from the north margin of Fulton Street to the east margin of Third Avenue North; all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 36969 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
